snippet: In a letter sent to members on Monday, the governors said new rules concerning inactivity — being used in an attempt to trim members — were unclear.
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences sends letter to members regarding plan to cull inactive members and add more minorities and women; says rules for determining inactivity are not yet defined and insists move 'is not about diversity.'
lead_paragraph: In a letter sent to members on Monday, the governors said new rules concerning inactivity — being used in an attempt to trim members — were unclear.

headline.main: Motion Picture Academy Finds That Revamping Isn’t So Easy
